verbose_text: In addition, AGEs can induce transcription factor nuclear factor kappa-light-chain-enhancer of activated B cells (NF-kappaB) and stress kinase ERK1/2 expression through the activation of the recognition receptor RAGE, followed by NOD like receptor (NLR) family member NLRP3 inflammasome formation, and IL-1 receptor activation and thereby systemic inflammation [XREF_BIBR].
